meanings.definition: A person or thing not belonging to or coming from a particular group or place.
meanings.sent1: The outsiders were not familiar with our customs.
meanings.sent2: The school club welcomed the new outsiders with open arms.
meanings.sent3: The outsiders tried to mimic our dance but ended up doing a funny twist.
meanings.sent4: In the world of birds, penguins are the outsiders who cannot fly like the rest.
meanings.sent5: The outsiders stood out in their bright, mismatched outfits.

meanings.definition: A person who is not a member of a particular profession, group, or organization.
meanings.sent1: The company hired outsiders to provide fresh perspectives.
meanings.sent2: The team meeting was only for insiders, not outsiders.
meanings.sent3: The outsiders at the conference were intrigued by the high-tech gadgets.
meanings.sent4: She felt like an outsider in the world of fashion, not understanding the latest trends.
meanings.sent5: The outsiders brought a different energy to the group project.
